title: Shizuku’s Worry
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Umm, Karin-san, I’d like to consult with you about something....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>With me? How rare, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It’s about fashion, so I wanted to ask you, Karin-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>So that’s it. I’d be glad to if I can be of help<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Umm.... I want you to answer truthfully, what do you think about my hair accessory? Things like.... It’s too big, or it’s childish....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? I hadn’t even thought about it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeh!? Are you really that disinterested in me, Karin-san! How lonely!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Sorry, sorry, that’s a bad way of putting it. I meant I’ve never thought of it more than that ribbon really suits you and looks cute, Shizuku-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh? I-, is that so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Of course. Plus, when I see someone’s back with that red ribbon, I can say, “There’s Shizuku-chan!” and I get all happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
